verses.text: Answer me when I call, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God \w of|strong="H4210"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* righteousness; Thou hast set me \w at|strong="H1732"\w* large \add when I was\add* \w in|strong="H1732"\w* distress: \w Have|strong="H1732"\w* mercy \w upon|strong="H5329"\w* me, \w and|strong="H1732"\w* hear \w my|strong="H1732"\w* prayer.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w ye|strong="H8085"\w* sons \w of|strong="H8085"\w* \w men|strong="H7121"\w*, \w how|strong="H8085"\w* \w long|strong="H8085"\w* \w shall|strong="H6664"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* glory \w be|strong="H2603"\w* turned into dishonor? \add How long\add* \w will|strong="H8085"\w* \w ye|strong="H8085"\w* love vanity, \w and|strong="H6030"\w* seek \w after|strong="H7121"\w* falsehood? \qs Selah\qs*

\w But|strong="H4100"\w* know \w that|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w hath|strong="H3639"\w* \w set|strong="H1245"\w* apart \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w himself|strong="H1245"\w* \w him|strong="H1245"\w* \w that|strong="H1121"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* godly: \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H1121"\w* hear \w when|strong="H5704"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* call \w unto|strong="H1121"\w* \w him|strong="H1245"\w*.

Stand \w in|strong="H3068"\w* awe, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* sin \w not|strong="H3045"\w*: Commune \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* own \w heart|strong="H8085"\w* \w upon|strong="H7121"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* bed, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w still|strong="H3588"\w*. \qs Selah\qs*
Offer \w the|strong="H5921"\w* sacrifices \w of|strong="H5921"\w* righteousness, \w And|strong="H3824"\w* put \w your|strong="H5921"\w* trust \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*.

Many \w there|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* say, \w Who|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* show us \add any\add* good? \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w lift|strong="H3068"\w* thou up \w the|strong="H3068"\w* light \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* countenance upon us.

\w Thou|strong="H6440"\w* hast \w put|strong="H3068"\w* gladness \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* heart, \w More|strong="H7227"\w* \w than|strong="H2896"\w* \add they have\add* \w when|strong="H7200"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* grain \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* new wine \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w increased|strong="H7227"\w*.

\w In|strong="H5414"\w* peace \w will|strong="H3820"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* both \w lay|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w down|strong="H5414"\w* \w and|strong="H1715"\w* sleep; \w For|strong="H6256"\w* \w thou|strong="H5414"\w*, \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, alone makest \w me|strong="H5414"\w* dwell \w in|strong="H5414"\w* safety.
